attributes.comment:
Ref: USCIS-2006-0044

I oppose the increase.

My husband and I are waiting to adopt a child and had to file an I-600A. We paid
the filing fee and the fingerprinting fee. Due to the long wait for the adoption and
the expiration dates of the I-171H and the fingerprints we will have to again pay the
fees.

Adoption is expensive and the increase in fees creates a hardship on families
willing to give these children a chance in life. Not all families that adopt
internationally are wealthy.

If the increase is approved I would ask that you extend the expiration of the I-171H
to two (2) years.

Thank you for considering my opinion.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by S.B.
